title: Looking for fonts similar to comic book titles
content:
can someone suggest a similar font to those used in the titles of these comics?

perhaps also the one used for "la sombra la brujo" too.

thanks a bunch!

(sorry for the attached images, i tried inserting the image, but it didn't work for some reason)

comments.content: Rockwell or Calvert for the egyptienne, not matches but similar.

It's really hard to find similar fonts to hand lettered titling. :^/

Micro Suspenso looks like Eurostile with a Ripple effect applied.

I don't refer to your samples here, but [http://www.comicbookfonts.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131221004542/http:/www.comicbookfonts.com/ "http://www.comicbookfonts.com") and [http://www.blambot.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131221004542/http:/www.blambot.com/ "http://www.blambot.com/") are specialized foundries for those comicbook-typefaces. A similar font for “la sombra la brujo” could be good old BANCO.
For p21, run an Illustrator filter on Eurostile.
